page.title: 20LAW AND ORDER IN SUTTON
page.content:
There has never been a Police Station in Sutton.In the past,the village policeman would ride through the village on his bicycle.Nowadays,the police drive through the village in Panda cars.Sometimes policemen visit the school to talk to the children about road safety and other matters concerning children's welfare.The Police Force responsible for looking after Sutton is based at Biggleswade Police Station.
Research for the Domesday Project on Sutton and the surrounding area conducted by the children of Sutton Lower School.
